sourcesContent:
Tabla Usuarios

This component demonstrates fetching data from the server.

Add Elements to Users Table

Loading...

ID de usuario Nombre de usuario
{{ user.user_id }} {{ user.user_name }}
ID de item Nombre del item Descripcion del item ID de vendedor
{{ item.item_id }} {{ item.item_name }} {{ item.item_description }} {{ item.user_id }}
ID de Subasta ID de item Comieno de subasta
{{ auction.auction_id }} {{ auction.item_id }} {{ auction.auction_start_date }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-users', templateUrl: './fetch-users.component.html' }) export class FetchUsersComponent { public users: Users[] = []; public items: Items[] = []; public auctions: Auctions[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient) { http.get('https://localhost:7268/api/Users').subscribe(result => { this.users = result; }, err => console.error(err)); /*http.get('localhost:7268/api/Users').subscribe(result => { this.items = result; }, err => console.error(err)); http.get('localhost:7268/api/Users').subscribe(result => { this.auctions = result; }, err => console.error(err));*/ } } interface Users { user_id: number; user_name: string; } interface Items { item_id: number; item_name: string; item_description: string; user_id: number; } interface Auctions{ auction_id: number; item_id: number; auction_start_date: Date; }
